abstract: If you no longer own some of the computers authorized to play your iTunes Store purchases, you can wipe the slate clean and start over.
snippet: If you no longer own some of the computers authorized to play your iTunes Store purchases, you can wipe the slate clean and start over.
lead_paragraph: Q. I am getting messages from iTunes that say I have already authorized the five computers I am allowed to use with my iTunes Store purchases, but I no longer own three of those five machines. Is there a way to unregister them from my iTunes account?
